page.title: 01POPULATION
page.content: Berry Pomeroy is a small village about two miles from Totnes. Most of the village is owned by the Duke of Somerset, who has a home near Berry Pomeroy Castle, his ancestral home. He also has a home at Milton Bradley, Wiltshire. The Duke and Duchess have a young son called Sebastian and one day he will be the Duke of Somerset. The Duke of Somerset's agent lives in the Manor House in the village. This house is believed to have been built on the foundations of the Norman Manor House where Ralf de Pomerai once lived. Ralf was the first Norman Lord of the Manor.
